triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core learning paradigm through which the paper proposes agents can develop all intelligence abilities.

triples.name: Intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper explains intelligence and all associated abilities through reward maximization.

triples.name: Learning
triples.relevance: Learning is identified as one of the core abilities driven by reward maximization.

triples.name: Perception
triples.relevance: Perception is highlighted as one of the abilities emerging from reward-driven learning.

triples.name: Social intelligence
triples.relevance: Social intelligence is listed as one of the core abilities explained by reward maximization.

triples.name: Language
triples.relevance: Language ability is identified as a capability that emerges from reward-driven learning.

triples.name: Generalization (learning)
triples.relevance: Generalization is mentioned as a core ability that reward maximization can produce.

triples.name: Imitation learning
triples.relevance: Imitation is mentioned as one of the key abilities that emerge from reward-based learning.

triples.name: Artificial general intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper proposes that powerful reinforcement learning agents could constitute a solution to achieving AGI.
